name: LOUISIANA COASTAL PROTECTION AND RESTORATION AUTHORITY
description: state agency responsible for protecting and restoring the coast of Louisiana
sampleDescriptions: Seeking laws and Executive Branch policies that expedite the permitting of state projects to protect and restore the Louisiana coast.
